resources.string: Welcome to Walkiria\'s currency exchange calculator. Please select your desired quantity, base coin and destination currency
Invalid value, please type a quantity
The currency exchange rate may be outdated. This can be normal if there is only one day of difference. If not, please try to open the app with an available internet connection.\nLast update on: %s
There has been an error retrieving values, we cannot offer an update exchange rate, please check back later and check your internet connection.
